audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: System Administrators

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux

name: netsar

screenshots.caption: Sample Excel CSV file following a Firefox Browser Session

short_description:
netsar intercepts and records the system calls associated with network activity which are called by a process .  The contents  of  the  network system calls are then summarized to create network historigrams per file descriptor to stdout in text summary, sar(1) style summary, or CVS formats.

netsar is a useful diagnostic  and debugging tool.  System administrators, diagnosticians  and
trouble-shooters will find it invaluable for solving network problems.
